column1: Binika (also known as Binka) is a town and a notified area committee in Subarnapur district  in the state of Odisha
Binika is located at 21.03°N 83.8°E﻿ / 21.03; 83.8. It has an average elevation of 122 metres (400 feet).
The city is situated in the bank of river Mahanadi. It is 32 km distance from Sonepur district.
